replies.body:
There's already Grim Reaper Karthus and Reaper Hecarim, so I don't see why not.
Riot like themes.

Jax could work with a scythe as well, make it a whole 'thing'.
Yea that would be really neat

Very good idea on the Kayn skin actually, something i would love to see personally would be a shuriman kayn skin, sort of like ekko (sandstorm). Since his transformations he could be some tresurehunter with robes or whatever his blue form could be an emperor or pharaoh style armor or clothes and his rhaast could even fit in the lore with the dark themes or nasus and renekton type demi-gods.

Also lets not forget about a new must christmas skin, Candy Kayn
